index.md.Différents outils offrant une meilleure: Different tools offering better interactivity with its Zigbee network are accessible from the plugin configuration page
index.md.Il est possible de réaliser une sauvegar: It is possible to make a backup of the Zigbee network from EZSP type controllers
index.md.Cette sauvegarde peut être restaurée sur: This backup can be restored to another controller of the same type
index.md.il n'est possible de procéder qu'à une s: it is only possible to carry out a single backup restore in all and for all during the entire life of the key
index.md.La sauvegarde ne contient pas la liste d: The backup does not contain the list of modules but only the basic information of the Zigbee network
index.md.Il n'est donc pas nécessaire d'en réalis: It is therefore not necessary to perform it regularly, a single backup is often sufficient because this information does not change during the life of the controller
index.md.Les démons Zigbee sont stoppés pendant l: Zigbee daemons are stopped during the backup or restore process
index.md.concerne uniquement les contrôleurs Elel: currently only applies to Elelabs controllers
index.md.Il est possible de mettre à jour le firm: It is possible to update the firmware of the Zigbee controller from Jeedom
index.md.Le firmware étant primordial en Zigbee c: The firmware being essential in Zigbee because it manages the routing among other things, it is important to update it
index.md.Les démons Zigbee sont arrêtés lors d'un: Zigbee daemons are stopped during a firmware update
index.md.sont les mises à jour des firmwares des: are the firmware updates of the modules
index.md.Le processus peut prendre un certain tem: The process can take a certain time (several hours depending on the number of modules) but allows better reliability of the Zigbee network in general
index.md.Pour être en mesure de mettre à jour un: To be able to update a module, the manufacturer must communicate its firmware
index.md.les firmwares sont directement mis à dis: the firmwares are directly made available online where the plugin will retrieve them
index.md.le fabricant fournit officieusement une: the manufacturer informally provides an update in some cases
index.md.Pour tous les autres, il n'est pas possi: For all others, it is not possible to update the module from the plugin
index.md.Afin de bénéficier des mises à jour OTA,: In order to benefit from OTA updates, you must check the corresponding box on the plugin configuration page then save
index.md.Il faut ensuite cliquer sur le bouton: You must then click on the button
index.md.pour récupérer les derniers fichiers à j: to retrieve the latest updated files and finally restart the Zigbee daemon
index.md.Les mises à jour s'effectuent automatiqu: Updates are carried out automatically in the event of availability or if the module requests it
index.md.Il est possible de forcer la mise à jour: It is possible to force the update of a module from the tab
index.md.de la fenêtre de configuration du module: from the module configuration window on the device page
index.md.Il n'existe malheureusement pas d'indica: Unfortunately, there is no simple indicator to follow the progress of the update, the only solution is to refer to the `zigbee_X` logs in debug and look for the term` OTA`
index.md.Vous pourrez voir ce type de log lorsqu': You will be able to see this type of log when a module updates
index.md.est une fonction particulière du Zigbee: is a particular function of Zigbee which allows the controller to send management orders to a module on condition of being very close to it
index.md.Cela est utile, par exemple, pour faire: This is useful, for example, to reset bulbs that do not have a physical button
index.md.Philips Hue, Ikea, Osram, Icasa et bien: Philips Hue, Ikea, Osram, Icasa and many more
index.md.Cette fonction est disponible sur les am: This function is available on Zigbee type bulbs
index.md.Le principe est très simple, pour pouvoi: The principle is very simple, to be able to associate this type of module with a Zigbee network, you must first perform a reset
index.md.Lors du redémarrage, le module va automa: When restarting, the module will automatically try to associate with the first available Zigbee network
index.md.Comme souvent en Zigbee, les difficultés: As often in Zigbee, difficulties can arise during the reset or association process
index.md.Plusieurs méthodes s'offrent à vous pour: Several methods are available to you to achieve this
index.md.Effectuer rapidement 5 ou 6 cycles d'all: Quickly perform 5 or 6 on / off cycles
index.md.L'ampoule doit clignoter à l'issue de la: The bulb should flash at the end of the procedure to indicate the correct recognition
index.md.il faut parfois éteindre\/allumer l'ampo: sometimes you have to turn off / turn on the bulb just before on some models
index.md.appuyer en même temps sur les boutons ON: simultaneously press the ON and OFF buttons for 5 to 10 seconds near the powered bulb
index.md.pendant 5 à 10 secondes près de l'ampoul: for 5 to 10 seconds near the powered bulb
index.md.vous pouvez également les inclure sur le: you can also include them on Hue Bridge and then remove them from it
index.md.Le binding permet de lier 2 modules dire: The binding allows you to link 2 modules directly to each other without the orders passing through Jeedom
index.md.Le lien se fait d'un cluster vers le mêm: The link is made from a cluster to the same cluster of another module
index.md.Il faut toujours faire le lien depuis la: The link must always be made from the control (remote control type) to the actuator
index.md.Vous retrouverez les éléments de gestion: You will find the binding management elements, if it is supported by your module, in the tab
index.md.Certains modules ne sont pas compatibles: Some modules are not compatible with the binding and others
index.md.ne supportent le binding que de la comma: only support the binding of the command to a group, it is therefore necessary to start by making a group in which you will have to put the actuator
index.md.La constitution d'un réseau Zigbee de bo: The constitution of a good quality Zigbee network is greatly helped by the tools made available in the plugin
index.md.Dirigez-vous vers la page générale du pl: Go to the general page of the plugin listing all the equipment and click on the button
index.md.pour accéder à différentes informations: to access various information and actions around the Zigbee network as well as the representative graphic thereof
index.md.Le graphique du réseau permet d'avoir un: The network graph provides an overview of the Zigbee network and the quality of communications with the different modules
index.md.Le graphique du réseau Zigbee est à titr: The Zigbee network graph is indicative and is based on the neighbors that the modules declare
index.md.Cela ne représente donc pas forcément le: This does not necessarily represent the real routing but a possible routing
index.md.il est plus que recommandé d'avoir au mi: it is more than recommended to have at least 3 router modules permanently powered and to avoid unplugging them
index.md.Afin d'optimiser la fiabilité de votre r: To optimize the reliability of your Zigbee network
index.md.En effet, lors de nos tests nous avons r: Indeed, during our tests we noticed a clear improvement in the reliability and resilience of the Zigbee network when adding router modules
index.md.Il est d'ailleurs conseillé de les inclu: It is also advisable to include them first, otherwise you will have to wait 24 to 48 hours for the "end-devices
index.md.Autre point important, il se peut, lors: Another important point, it is possible, when removing a router module, that part of the "end-device
index.md.soit perdue pendant un temps plus ou moi: either lost for a longer or shorter time
index.md.ou même définitivement et que vous ayez: or even definitely and you have to re-include them
index.md.Malheureusement cela est dû à la manière: Unfortunately this is due to the way in which the manufacturer has planned the integration of its equipment within a Zigbee network and therefore cannot be corrected by the plugin which does not manage the routing part
index.md.Pour finir et même si cela peut paraître: Finally, and even if it may seem obvious to some, we remind you that Zigbee gateways in Wifi are less reliable than USB gateways
index.md.L'équipe Jeedom conseille donc l'utilisa: The Jeedom team therefore recommends the use of a Zigbee gateway in USB
index.md.Le LQI ou le RSSI est à N\/A: LQI or RSSI is N / A
index.md.Les valeurs sont normalement vidées aprè: Values are normally emptied after restarting the zigbee daemon
index.md.Il faut attendre que le module communiqu: You have to wait for the module to communicate again for the values to be entered
index.md.J'ai des soucis d'inclusion ou des erre: I have inclusion issues or errors in the type logs
index.md.Il faut essayer de supprimer ou de chang: You should try to remove or change the USB extension if you are using one or install one if you are not using one
index.md.C'est en général dû à un souci de routag: This is usually due to a routing issue
index.md.le routage est plus ou moins fixe en Zig: the routing is more or less fixed in Zigbee but not symmetrical, a module can use a different route to respond than the one used to talk to it
index.md.suffit à régler le problème: is enough to solve the problem
index.md.J'ai des erreurs bizarres sur des module: I have weird errors on battery modules or inclusion issues
index.md.Nous avons remarqué qu'une bonne partie: We noticed that a good part of the problems of the modules on battery are due to the batteries or possibly problems of resetting the modules to zero before inclusion
index.md.Même si celles-ci semblent neuves, il es: Even if these appear to be new, it is advisable to test with new batteries to rule out this hypothesis
index.md.J'ai des soucis de mise à jour des valeu: I have concerns updating the values of the equipment

index.md.Dans ce cas il faut absolument une comma: In this case you absolutely need a "Refresh" command so that you or Jeedom force the update of the values
index.md.Si cette commande n'existe pas dans l'éq: If this command does not exist in the equipment, you must contact Jeedom support to have it added in the next stable version
index.md.Une fois sortie, il faudra cliquer sur l: Once out, click on the button
